body.p: A number used to identify the meaning (or status) of the data which immediately follows the GS1_Application_Identifier_(Internal) .
Codes 95-97 have been reserved for national use only, and are not to be allocated by the NHS locally. Codes 98 and 99 can be allocated by the NHS for local use.
Further guidance can be found on the NHS Digital Â website at: DCB1077: AIDC for Patient Identification.
